positions.title: Assistant Chief Counsel

positions.description:
â¢ Prepared and filed immigrant and non-immigrant visa petitions for business investors, beneficiaries of family-based petitions, and asylum-seekers.
â¢ Researched and drafted legal memoranda, including BIA and AAO appeals relating to various grounds of inadmissibility, including fraud and willful misrepresentation.
â¢ Represented clients in immigration court and USCIS interviews.
â¢ Performed client interviews in English, Russian, and Spanish.
positions.title: Associate Attorney

positions.companyName: Law Offices of Chavez & De Leon, P.A.
positions.title: Law Clerk

positions.description:
â¢Conducted first-chair litigation in deportation proceedings, including cross examination.
â¢Took initiative to prepare motions and legal memoranda on novel and complex issues, e.g. relating the mens rea of state narcotics statutes to the federal statutes to establish their applicability for immigration purposes under the INA.  
â¢Collaborated with domestic and foreign law enforcement agencies to obtain conviction records and other evidence to be used in deportation proceedings.
positions.title: Summer Intern

positions.description:

â¢Conducted research and trial preparation for criminal justice matters.
